name: Mirror Dream Tree
summary: Merin is reincarnated into a new world.After he died in his previous world.And the new world is an extraordinary world.He is full of curiosity and fear for the new world.But he is born in the new world as a tree.Struck in a place.To explore the new world, he tries to find way to escape from his tree body, or transforms himself to a humanoid.In the process, he finds the reason he reincarnated into this world.A mirror, that can send his soul to reincarnate into new worlds.**The first few volumes would be Merin living new lives in different world.**And you can read advance chapter for the next day at my Patreon Account: /Crimsonsoul
author: crimsonsoul
